description: This file contains a simple smoke test for checking basic functionality, verifying that 1 + 1 equals 2.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case named 'smoke' which performs a basic assertion to verify that 1 + 1 equals 2.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Sets up an expectation for the expression 1 + 1, asserting it should be equal to 2.
